intro: Notonerium gossei, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Gesneriaceae family and is characterized by its velvety, fleshy leaves and showy, tubular flowers. The plant typically grows as a perennial shrub, often reaching heights of up to 1 meter. Its flowers come in a variety of colors, including pink, purple, and white, and are pollinated by insects. Notonerium gossei is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements.
